mapper.select: select c.id as commentId, u.id as vlogerId, c.father_comment_id as fatherCommentId, c.vlog_id as vlogId, u.id as commentUserId, u.nickname as commentUserNickname, u.face as commentUserFace, c.content as content, c.like_counts as likeCounts, c.create_time as createTime from `comment` c left join users u on c.comment_user_id = u.id where c.vlog_id = #{paramMap.vlogId} order by c.like_counts, c.create_time desc
select u.nickname as replyedUserNickname from `comment` c left join users u on c.comment_user_id = u.id where c.id = #{fatherCommentId}
